inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.

inclusion.criterion: treated or not for at least two years who died as a result of confirmed or probable SUDEP or NEAR SUDEP
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patient with active epilepsy (treated or not) or in remission under treatment
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient first developed seizures at age 13 found by family to have a generalized convulsion. He had a second seizure two years after his first episode.

inclusion.criterion: without treatment for at least two years who died as a result of confirmed or probable SUDEP or NEAR SUDEP
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patient with active epilepsy (treated or not) or in remission under treatment or without treatment for at least two years and matched by: age, epileptic syndrom and level of seizure controls
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity. The patient first developed seizures at age 13 found by family to have a generalized convulsion.
